import { Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Cart({ cartItems, SetcartItems }) { console.log(cartItems); function increaseqty(items){ if(items.qty === items.product.stock){ return ; } const updateitems = cartItems.map((i)=>{ if(i.product._id === items.product._id){ i.qty++; } return i; }) SetcartItems(updateitems); } return (

Your Cart: {cartItems.length}

{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.product.description}

${item.product.price}

- +
))}

Order Summary

Subtotal: 1 (Units)

Est. total: $245.67

); }
